name: Music_2411.wav
keywords: ['singing bowl', 'different frequencies', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'no melody', 'meditation music']
caption: This clip starts with a low frequency music bowl being struck. The note is allowed to sustain. After a while, a higher frequency music bowl is struck and that note is allowed to sustain. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. The sound of music bowls can be played in a meditation center.
